caller_intent: Ricardo is following up on a previous request related to a college matter, seeking an update that Carbon had asked him to check on.
resolution_steps: Carbon acknowledges not having received an update yet.
Ricardo requests a one-day extension to wait for a response.
Carbon agrees to call back the next day around 10 AM.
knowledge_required: Understanding the context of prior communication about college-related tasks
summary: Ricardo checks in with Carbon about a college-related update, noting no response yet. Carbon agrees to follow up the next day at 10 AM, citing office meetings as a reason for the delay. The conversation concludes with mutual acknowledgment of the timeline.
